{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=TG3442 |revision=(S/CE) |asin= |series=AC2200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=07/13/2020 |fcc_id=UIDTG3442 |ic_id= |pcb_id=ARCT04789 |type=wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model=FHCE2752M;Puma 7, FHCE2752M, (SR31B); |cpu1_cspeed=2.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG2S0HBAI4 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BYK0 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 (Gen1) |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Celeno |wi1_chip1_model=CL2440 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Celeno |wi2_chip1_model=CL2432 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Intel |sw_model=PEB7085M |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module (FEM);Skyworks;SKY85720-11;SKY, 720, 20001;4; ,,, DOCSIS 3.1 Cable Receiver (Tuner);MaxLinear;MXL277;;1; ,,, DOCSIS 3.1 Upstream Amplifier;MaxLinear;MXL236;;1; ,,, Single-Chip Power Management IC;Rohm;BD2650MWV;;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.1, Wave2, MU-MIMO, analog phone port, PacketCable 2.0, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ARRIS - XXXX, ARRIS - XXXX-5G }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/products/touchstone-tg3442-cable-voice-gateway/}} {{•}} [https://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/touchstone-tg3442-data-sheet.pdf Datasheet] {{See also|Arris TG3452|List of DOCSIS Cable Modems}} ===Features=== * 2x2 OFDM and OFDMA DOCSIS 3.1 channels * 32x8 SCQAM DOCSIS 3.0 channels{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }} * Full Capture Bandwidth Tuner, 4x port Gigabit Ethernet Router * Multi Processor Technology with ARM/ATOM based Application CPU * Switchable upstream filters for 42MHz, 85MHz or 204MHz operation * 4x4 Integrated Dual Band Concurrent 5GHz 802.11ac Wave2 radios : and 3x3/2x2 2.4GHz 802.11n for high performance WLAN * Multiple SSID support with DFS channels, Dynamic Channel change * Single PCB design, designed for enhanced application support * Multiple operator controlled configuration options ===News=== *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/arris-touchstone-tg3442-cable-gateway-3941 On '''SpeedGuide'''] *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31134730-Equip-FWIW-The-Arris-TG3482-XB6-Just-Went-Through-FCC-Testing On '''DSLReports'''] *[http://www.multichannel.com/news/distribution/arris-expands-docsis-31-gigabit-gateway-family/407937 On '''MultiChannel'''] ===Variants=== *'''TG3442''' - ANNEX B DOCSIS :Spatial Streams: 3/2 for 2.4GHz, 4 for 5GHz :Open source toolchain: [https://sourceforge.net/arris/tg3442/home/Home/ Sourceforge] * '''TG3442DE''' - variant used by german Vodafone Kabel provider. :Contains a [https://github.com/nox-x/TG3442DE-Teardown/blob/main/Hardware.md TG3442S/CE board]. Open source toolchain: [https://sourceforge.net/arris/tg3442de/home/Home/ Sourceforge] *'''TG3442S/CE''' - ANNEX A EuroDOCSIS :Spatial Streams: 3/4 for 2.4GHz, 4 for 5GHz :It's not clear what 3/2 and 3/4 SS means but one variant :is apparently 3x3:3 while the other is 2x2:2 for 2.4GHz. ===See also=== :;[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] • [http://www.arris.com/products/docsis-3.1-broadband-devices/ DOCSIS 3.1 Broadband Devices] *[[Arris TG3442]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi *[[Arris TG3452]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0 *[[Arris TG3462]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT *[[Arris TG3482ER]] - ''Touchstone Wireless Telephony Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT *[[Arris DG3450]] - ''Touchstone Cable Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0 __NOTOC__
